sources.title: THE THIRSTY DEAD
sources.description: Beautiful young girls are kidnapped off the streets of Manila by a death cult that needs their blood to remain immortal.

sources.title: The Thirsty Dead (1974) Blood Hunt
sources.description:
Stars: Jennifer Billingsley, Judith McConnell, John Considine
Writer/Director: Terry Becker

Beautiful young girls are kidnapped off the streets of Manila by a death cult that needs their blood to remain immortal.

metadata.Plot: Beautiful young girls are kidnapped off the streets of Manila by a death cult that needs their blood to remain immortal.
metadata.Writer: Charles Dennis, Terry Becker, Lou Whitehill
metadata.Actors: Jennifer Billingsley, John Considine, Judith McConnell
